metro.WindowControls

Class ActionObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.WindowControls.ActionObserver

  • public abstract class ActionObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    Who ever wants to be able to get information about state changed, button clicks, etc. of window controls, should implement this interface. All implementations of this method are optional and keeps the code of the implementation cleaner and smaller.
    Author:
    hauke

      Constructor and Description
      ActionObserver()

      Is called when a control (e.g. a window) is closed.

      Gets called when an input control got new input (or input changed).

      Is called when an entry of a list control gets selected.

        public void gotInput(java.lang.String text)
        Gets called when an input control got new input (or input changed).
        Parameters:
        text - The new text of the input control

      • checkStateChanged

        public void checkStateChanged(boolean newState)
        Is called when the check state changed
        Parameters:
        newState - The new state of the control.

      • selectionChanged

        public void selectionChanged(java.lang.String entry)
        Is called when an entry of a list control gets selected.
        Parameters:
        entry - The text of the selected entry.

        Is called when a control (e.g. a window) is closed.
        Parameters:
